entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
